text_content.paragraph: Welcome to Module 5! As an employee, performing a Map search is a key job task used to help you to visualize company assets in specific geographic locations. In this module we will discuss the functionality associated with navigating to a specific geographic location using the available search options under the Map tab.
This module should take approximately 35 minutes to complete.

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.
